Elect.definition: to select by vote for an office
Elect.origin: [ ed her statutory share over the gift under the will]

1.definition: to select by vote for an office, position, or membership

2.definition: to make a selection of [her statutory share over the gift under the will]to choose an elective share [the right of a spouse to against the will]
2.ed: her statutory share over the gift under the will]
